CmdLine: useradd docker 	&& mkdir /home/docker 	&& chown docker:docker /home/docker 	&& addgroup docker staff     && echo "en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8" >> /etc/locale.gen 	&& locale-gen en_US.utf8 	&& /usr/sbin/update-locale LANG=en_US.UTF-8
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo 'deb http://cran.rstudio.com/bin/linux/ubuntu xenial/' >> /etc/apt/sources.list         && apt-get update 	&& apt-get install -y --force-yes --no-install-recommends 		r-base-dev wget curl git         && echo 'options(repos = list(CRAN = "http://cran.rstudio.com/"))' >> /etc/R/Rprofile.site     && apt-get clean 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/*         /usr/share/man/* /usr/share/groff/* /usr/share/info/*         /usr/share/lintian/* /usr/share/linda/* /var/cache/man/*
Commands.Name: run
